about_the_game:
Welcome to the Reaper Rules Demo!

Discover the immersive world of Reaper Rules with a sample full of action and adventure! In this demo, you'll have the chance to experience the unique gameplay systems and get familiar with the two protagonists, Asso and Jake, each with their own perspective and playstyle.

What to expect in the demo:

Two Gameplay Styles:

  • Control Asso in 2D platformer stages, armed with his scythe to defeat enemies and overcome obstacles.

  • Command Jake in top-down view environments, shooting enemies in frantic combat while exploring intriguing areas.

Introductory Stages:

  • Tackle initial challenges designed to introduce each character's unique abilities.

Mysterious Story:

  • Get a first look at a rich narrative that connects the two characters and the virtual world that traps them.

Action and Fluidity:

  • Experience the smooth transition between gameplay styles as you switch between the protagonists, learning their strengths and strategies.

Ready to begin this journey and uncover the first secrets of the Reaper?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
